sent.orig: Severe digestive symptoms always accompany severe hepatitis. Severe hepatitis is closely related to gastrointestinal insufficiency.
sent.trans: 重型肝炎常伴有严重的消化道症状，重型肝炎与胃肠功能密切相关。

sent.orig: The advanced patients often possess severe jaundice, severe liver dysfunction, biliary cirrhosis, portal hypertension.
sent.trans: 晚期病人常有重度黄疸、严重肝功能损害、胆汁性肝硬变、门静脉高压症的表现。

sent.orig: Loggers also deal with severe environmental conditions such as inclement weather and severe heat cold.
sent.trans: 伐木者还需要在严酷的环境条件下工作，例如险恶的天气，严寒和酷暑。

sent.orig: Severe and very severe pneumonia require additional treatment, such as oxygen, to be given in hospital.
sent.trans: 严重和非常严重的肺炎还需要额外治疗，例如输氧气。

sent.orig: There were no severe complications, such as severe duct and duct perforation and no death patient.
sent.trans: 未发生胆管穿孔和胆道大出血，无死亡病例。
